page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: As the{population}of the area is low, farming is the main employment. Thornton College is a private girls'{school}and employs teachers as well as cleaning staff, cooks, gardeners and general maintenance people. There is a{gamekeeper}at Hyde Lane to deter poachers and there is a sewage works that need supervision and maintenance. At the Old Mill builders are employed to renovate the houses around it. Some overhead power cables are being renewed by engineers. Some livery{stables}are in the area, and in a lay-by on the A422 there is a caravan converted into a cafe for passing travellers.
